DOC.brief_summary: This is a chart review of all trauma patients during the specified time period. The purpose of this study is to examine the effects of resuscitation with hextend after trauma, in the adult population. The authors hypothesize that when compared to patients resuscitated with standard of care, resuscitation with Hextend will result in a mortality difference.
DOC.criteria: Admission to the trauma center Pregnant women, children, psychiatric patients and prisoners.
